2023.title: Language Technology Project
2023.desc: In this project-based course, students are going to work on a natural language processing challenge. A challenge is a practical task in NLP related to a particular research topic.

2023.title: Project Text Analysis
2023.desc: This is an introductory course to processing large amounts of textual data. The basics of language processing will be introduced both from a theoretical and practical perspectives.

2022.title: Introduction to Programming I
2022.desc: This course, together with the subsequent courses Introduction to Programming II and Advanced Programming, constitutes a basic course unit in the curriculum of Information Science, where the student learns to program.

2022.title: Language Technology Project
2022.desc: In this project-based course, students are going to work on a natural language processing challenge. A challenge is a practical task in NLP related to a particular research topic.

2022.title: Information Science BA Thesis
2022.desc: The Bachelors degree programme in Information Science is concluded by a research project of limited scope, in which students are expected to set up, conduct and report on their own research.
